summary.span: 表示 中的一行数据。

span.span: Represents a row of data in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 对象是 的主要组件。The and objects are primary components of a . 使用 对象及其属性和方法来检索和评估;并在 中插入、删除和更新值。Use the object and its properties and methods to retrieve and evaluate; and insert, delete, and update the values in the . 表示 中的实际 对象，而 包含描述 架构的 对象。The represents the actual objects in the , and the contains the objects that describe the schema of the . 使用重载的 属性返回或设置 的值。Use the overloaded property to return or set the value of a . 使用 "" 和 "" 属性来确定特定行值的状态，并使用 "" 属性来确定相对于其父 的行的状态。Use the and properties to determine the status of a particular row value, and the property to determine the state of the row relative to its parent . 若要创建新 ，请使用 对象的 方法。To create a new , use the method of the object. 创建新的 后，使用 方法将新 添加到 。After creating a new , use the method to add the new to the . 最后，调用 对象的 方法，确认添加。Finally, call the method of the object to confirm the addition. 有关将数据添加到 的详细信息，请参阅[将数据添加到 DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md)。For more information about adding data to a , see [Adding Data to a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md). 可以通过调用 的 方法，或通过调用 对象的 方法，从 中删除 。You can delete a from the by calling the method of the , or by calling the method of the object. 方法从集合中移除行。The method removes the row from the collection. 相反， 会标记要删除的 。In contrast, marks the for removal. 调用 方法时，将发生实际的删除。The actual removal occurs when you call method. 通过调用 ，你可以以编程方式检查哪些行在实际删除之前标记为删除。By calling , you can programmatically check which rows are marked for removal before actually deleting them. 有关详细信息，请参阅[DataRow 删除](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datarow-deletion.md)。For more information, see [DataRow Deletion](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datarow-deletion.md). ## Examples 下面的示例通过调用 对象的 方法来创建新 。The following example creates a new by calling the method of the object. summary.span: 提交自上次调用 以来对该行进行的所有更改。

span.span: Commits all the changes made to this row since the last time was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 时， 方法将被隐式调用以结束任何编辑。When invoking , the method is implicitly called to end any edits. 如果添加或修改了该行的 ，则 将变得不变。If the of the row was Added or Modified, the becomes Unchanged. 如果删除了 ，则删除该行。If the was Deleted, the row is removed. 有关更多信息，请参阅 方法。See the method for more information. 类还具有一个 方法，该方法会影响对整个表所做的更改。The class also has an method which affects changes made to the whole table. 有关演示如何接受和拒绝对单个数据行所做的更改的代码示例，请参阅[AcceptChanges 和 RejectChanges](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/acceptchanges-and-rejectchanges.md)。For more information and a code example that demonstrates how to accept and reject changes to individual data rows, see [AcceptChanges and RejectChanges](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/acceptchanges-and-rejectchanges.md). ## Examples 下面的示例首先创建一个新的 ，其中包含一个列，然后创建一个 。The following example first creates a new with one column, and then creates a single . 创建、添加、修改和删除 时，将打印其 。As the is created, added, modified, and deleted, its is printed. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BeginEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 对 对象启动编辑操作。

span.span: Starts an edit operation on a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法将 置于编辑模式。Use the method to put a into edit mode. 在此模式下，事件会暂时挂起，使用户无需触发验证规则即可更改多行。In this mode, events are temporarily suspended, letting the user make changes to more than one row without triggering validation rules. 例如，如果您必须确保总计的列的值与行中的借方列和贷方列的值相等，则可以将每一行置于编辑模式，以挂起行值验证，直到用户尝试提交值。For example, if you must make sure that the value of the column for a total amount is equal to the values for the debit and credit columns in a row, you can put each row into edit mode to suspend the validation of the row values until the user tries to commit the values. 当用户更改数据绑定控件的值时，将隐式调用 方法;调用 对象的 方法时，将隐式调用 方法。The method is called implicitly when the user changes the value of a data-bound control; the method is called implicitly when you invoke the method for the object. 在此编辑模式下， 存储原始值和新的建议值的表示形式。While in this edit mode, the stores representations of the original and new proposed values. 因此，只要未调用 方法，就可以通过为 属性的 `version` 参数传递 `DataRowVersion.Original` 或 `DataRowVersion.Proposed` 来检索原始版本或建议版本。Therefore, as long as the method has not been called, you can retrieve either the original or proposed version by passing either `DataRowVersion.Original` or `DataRowVersion.Proposed` for the `version` parameter of the property. 您还可以通过调用 方法，在此时取消任何编辑。You can also cancel any edits at this point by invoking the method. 若要查看行是否包含原始值或建议值，请调用 方法。To see if the row contains an original or proposed value, call the method. > [!NOTE] > 方法暂时挂起 事件，但 `delete` 操作不会。The method temporarily suspends events, but the `delete` operation does not. ## Examples 该示例创建一个简单的 ，其中包含一个 和五个 对象和一个 。The example creates a simple with one and five objects, and a . 还添加了一个 事件处理程序，以便在行的值更改时进行监视。A event handler is also added to monitor when the row's value is changing. 对现有行调用 后，将暂时禁用约束和事件，并打印原始值和建议值。After invoking on the existing rows, the constraint and event are temporarily disabled and the original and proposed values are printed. 再次调用 ，以将两行设置为相同的值。The is again invoked to set two rows to the same value. 调用 时，将对相同的值强制执行 。When is called, the is enforced on the identical values. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 设置和返回各个列的错误。Use and to set and return errors for individual columns. 设置 属性，以设置适用于整行的错误。Set the property to set an error that applies to the whole row. 若要确定列集合是否存在任何错误，请使用 方法。To determine whether any errors exist for the columns collection, use the method. 因此，您可以使用 方法来检索所有包含错误的列。Consequently, you can use the method to retrieve all the columns with errors. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 来查找错误。The following example uses the to look for errors. 如果行有错误， 方法将返回列的数组，其中包含可解决的错误。If the row has errors, the method returns the array of columns with errors that can then be resolved. 然后调用 方法以清除所有错误。The method is then called to clear all errors. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果添加了行的 ，则 将变为 `Detached`，并且当调用 时，将从表中删除该行。If the of the row is Added, the becomes `Detached` and the row is removed from the table when you call . 在现有 上使用 方法之后， 将变为 `Deleted`。The becomes `Deleted` after you use the method on an existing . 在调用 之前，它将保持 `Deleted`。It remains `Deleted` until you call . 此时，将从表中删除 。At this time, the is removed from the table. 在循环访问 对象时，不应在 foreach 循环中调用 。 should not be called in a foreach loop while iterating through a object. 修改集合的状态。 modifies the state of the collection. 可以通过调用 删除删除的行。A deleted row can be undeleted by invoking . > [!NOTE] > 方法暂时挂起 事件，但删除操作不会。The method temporarily suspends events, but the delete operation does not. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个具有两列和10行的简单 。The following example creates a simple with two columns and ten rows. 使用 方法删除多个 项后，将通过调用 取消删除某行。After deleting several items with the method, one of the rows is undeleted by invoking . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果行中的任何 对象包含错误，则 `HasErrors` 返回 `true`; 如果 的 属性不为空字符串，则返回。`HasErrors` returns `true` if any object in the row contains an error, or if the property of the is not an empty string. 在验证数据时，您可以对行中的任何列设置错误。When validating data, you can set an error on any column in a row. 此类列在 控件中显示时，将标有一个红色的感叹号，以向用户发送此列出错的消息。Such a column, when displayed in the control, is marked with a red exclamation point to signal to the user that the column is in error. 使用 对任何列设置错误。Use to set an error on any column. 使用 和 `GetColumnsInError` 方法返回包含错误的列。Use the and `GetColumnsInError` methods to return columns with errors. 方法将清除该行的所有错误。The method clears all errors for the row. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 来查找错误。The following example uses the to look for errors. 如果行有错误， 方法将返回列的数组，其中包含可解决的错误。If the row has errors, the method returns the array of columns with errors that can then be resolved. 然后调用 方法以清除所有错误。The method is then called to clear all errors. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用 方法后，只能创建或更新行;同样，必须调用 方法才能提交编辑。You can only create or update a row after you call the method; similarly, the method must be called to commit the edit. 调用 方法并且调用 方法之前，会存储原始值和新的建议值的内部表示形式。After you call the method, and before you call the method, internal representations of the original and new proposed values are stored. 因此，在调用 之前，您可以使用 `version` 自变量来指定所需的列值的版本，`DataRowVersion.Original` 或 `DataRowVersion.Proposed`。Therefore, until you call the , you can use the `version` argument to specify which version of a column's value you need, either the `DataRowVersion.Original` or `DataRowVersion.Proposed`. 但是，一旦调用 方法，列的版本就会恢复为 `DataRowVersion.Original`。However, as soon as you call the method, the version of the column reverts to `DataRowVersion.Original`. 如果行是新行，还可以传递参数 `DataRowVersion.Default`，以检索列的默认值。If the row is new, you can also pass `DataRowVersion.Default` for the parameter to retrieve the column's default value. 传递 `DataRowVersion.Current`时，属性将返回当前值，无论其版本是什么。When passing `DataRowVersion.Current`, the property returns the current value, whatever its version may be. > [!NOTE] > 当您更改数据绑定控件的值或将 对象添加到 时，将隐式调用 方法;调用以下方法时，将隐式调用 方法： 对象的 方法、 对象的 方法或 方法。The method is called implicitly when you change the value of a data-bound control or when a object is added to the ; the method is called implicitly when you call the following methods: the method of the object, the method of the object, or the method. 与此相反， 枚举 `Current` 在调用 方法之后返回数据的版本。By contrast, the enumeration `Current` returns the version of the data after the method has been called. 不应将 `version` 参数与 属性混淆。The `version` argument should not be confused with the property. `version` 参数说明列所包含的数据相对于列的原始值的状态。The `version` argument describes the state of the data that is contained by the column relative to the column's original value. 属性说明了相对于其父级 的整行的状态。The property describes the state of the whole row relative to its parent . 设置属性时，如果 事件中发生异常，则会生成异常。When you set the property, an exception is generated if an exception occurs in the event. 如果这是立即编辑，请参阅 ，了解可以生成的异常。If this is an immediate edit, see for the exceptions that can be generated. ## Examples 下面的示例通过 对象的 属性获取列的当前值。The following example gets the current value of a column through the property of the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类的 属性设置列的名称。The name of a column is set with the property of the class. 若要检查错误说明，请使用 方法。To examine error descriptions, use the method. 若要确定列集合是否存在任何错误，请使用 属性。To determine whether any errors exist for the columns collection, use the property. 因此，您可以使用 方法来检索所有包含错误的列。Consequently, you can use the method to retrieve all the columns with errors. 如果 `null` 或空字符串作为 `error` 参数传入， 的行为就好像未设置错误， 属性将返回 false。If `null` or an empty string is passed in as the `error` parameter, the behaves as if no error was set and the property will return false. 若要对整行设置自定义错误说明，请使用 属性。To set a custom error description on the whole row, use the property. 若要确定列集合是否存在任何错误，请使用 方法。To determine whether any errors exist for the columns collection, use the method. 若要清除列集合的所有错误，请使用 方法。To clear all errors for the columns collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例为指定的 设置错误说明。The following example sets an error description for a specified .
